name: Fight for Vengeance
storyline:
The year is 2033, world governments have become totalitarian and control their people like flocks of sheep, world policies are one of competition between nations that seek to develop military technologies to impose their interests of domination on less favored peoples.
Megacorporations founded with the union of superblocs of nations carry out research and experiments to remain up to date in military capacity so as not to be subjugated, as the obsolescence of power means the extinction of values ​​and culture, as well as the power groups that control the regions of global influence.

Advances in quantum physics research ended up opening interdimensional portals, but this occurred accidentally and unplanned, bringing to light countless possibilities for exploring new materials to develop new technologies.

Exploring these parallel worlds, something very dangerous and inexplicable was found, which caused these experiments to be cancelled, but perhaps too late, Pandora's box had already been opened.

Blazor is a creature that was imprisoned in one of these parallel worlds and during a scientific expedition looking for minerals he took the opportunity to cross the portal into the world of men.
